pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lc0 is a UCI-compliant chess engine designed to play chess via neural network. Like all other Chess (or Go) engines, Leela maintains a tree of potential future moves and game states. Each potential game state is called a node in the tree, and each node has a list of child nodes corresponding to the potential moves (edges) for that board position.
